thread.title: BRIEF-‍Northwest Healthcare Properties Real Estate Investment Trust Announces Jan Distribution​

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-‍Northwest Healthcare Properties Real Estate Investment Trust Announces Jan Distribution​

organizations.name: northwest healthcare properties real estate investment trust

text:
Jan 15 (Reuters) - Northwest Healthcare Properties Reit :
* ‍NORTHWEST HEALTHCARE PROPERTIES REAL ESTATE INVESTMENT TRUST ANNOUNCES JANUARY 2018 DISTRIBUTION​
* NORTHWEST HEALTHCARE - ‍TRUSTEES HAVE DECLARED DISTRIBUTION OF $0.06667 PER UNIT FOR JANUARY, 2018, REPRESENTING $0.80 PER UNIT ON ANNUALIZED BASIS​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
